front.title: Conventions for the use of the Session Description Protocol (SDP) for ATM Bearer Connections

abstract.t: This document described conventions for using the Session Description Protocol (SDP) described in RFC2327 for controlling ATM Bearer Connections, and any associated ATM Adaptation Layer (AAL). The AALs addressed are Type 1, Type 2 and Type 5. This list of conventions is meant to be exhaustive. Individual applications can use subsets of these conventions. Further, these conventions are meant to comply strictly with the SDP syntax as defined in rfc2327.
